public_data.bio: Bootstrapped builder shipping AI products weekly. Cares about fast experiments, distribution, and revenue.
posts: Shipped a micro-SaaS feature in 48 hours and got 19 paid users.
Distribution > coding. A strong hook and clear CTA beats fancy architecture early.
Need benchmarks and evidence when evaluating model quality.
links: profile: product-led growth and founder workflows

public_data.bio: Runs multi-channel content systems for B2B creators. Prioritizes clarity, repeatable formats, and proof-backed claims.
posts: When content underperforms, diagnose hook, audience-fit, and trust signals first.
Prefer case studies with concrete numbers over generic thought leadership.
Create reusable content templates to scale quality.
